00030 #include<stdio.h>
00031 #include<string.h>
00032 #include <ctype.h>
00033 #include<stdlib.h>
00034 
00035 void hex_toAscii(char [],char [],int len);
00036 
00037 int main()
00038 {
00039 
00040     FILE *f = fopen("cfg.txt","rb");
00041     int len;
00042     size_t result;
00043 unsigned long fileLen;
00044 //Get file length
00045         fseek(f, 0, SEEK_END);
00046         fileLen=ftell(f);
00047         fseek(f, 0, SEEK_SET);
00048         printf("FILE LEN LEFT %ld\n",fileLen);
00049 
00050 
00051    unsigned char frame_len[2];
00052     while (fileLen != 0) /* read a line */{
00053 
00054                 fseek (f,2 ,SEEK_CUR);
00055                 fread(frame_len, sizeof(unsigned char),2, f);
00056                 fseek (f,-4 ,SEEK_CUR);
00057 
00058                 len = frame_len[0];
00059                 len <<= 8;
00060                 len |= frame_len[1];
00061 
00062                 char *buf;
00063                 buf = malloc(len*sizeof(unsigned char));
00064                 memset(buf,'\0',len);
00065                 fread(buf, sizeof(unsigned char),len, f);
00066                 int i;
00067                 for(i = 0; i<len; i++)printf("0x%02x\t", buf[i]);       
00068 
00069                 free(buf);
00070                 printf("LEN = %d \n\n",len);
00071                 fileLen -= len;
00072         }
00073 
00074     printf("\n");
00075 
00076     fclose(f);
00077 
00078     return(0);
00079 }
00080 
00081 
00082 
00083 void hex_toAscii(char frame[],char buffer[],int len) {
00084 
00085     char *src = frame;
00086     char *dst = buffer;
00087     char *end = buffer + len;
00088 
00089     unsigned int u;
00090 
00091     while (dst < end && sscanf(src, "%2x", &u) == 1)
00092     {
00093         *dst++ = u;
00094         src += 2;
00095     } 
00096 
00097 }
